department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: three pronged elaborate blade; top two prongs have curved arches with pointed ends; smaller prong is curved with a single, longer point on the outer side; embossed, squiggly designs throughout the metal on the blade area, with circular designs on top two prongs and in the center, and is on both front and back side of blade; snakeskin handle in deep brown with jagged stitching on backside
title: Status blade
